page.title: Stardust
page.t: This Ship is an addition to Easy Life, it is more or less cheating. It has a decent Storage area, holds tons of people for the missions, is a very good carrier, almost undestructable, kills even Ks without much of a sweat. After that, lean back and enjoy your Easy Life in X4.
This Cannon was exclusivlely designed to burn the whole universe.
This Laser was designed to counter the Khaak destroyers.

This Ship is an addition to Easy Life, it is more or less cheating. It has a decent Storage area, holds tons of people for the missions, is a very good support ship, almost undestructable, kills even Ks without much of a sweat. After that, lean back and enjoy your Easy Life in X4.

This Ship is an addition to Easy Life, it is more or less cheating. It has a decent Storage area, holds tons of people for the missions, is a very good support ship, almost undestructable, kills even Ks without much of a sweat. After that, lean back and enjoy your Easy Life in X4.
